channel.title: RuneSource 484
channel.description:
[center] Hello, I am working on a new project based on the 484 revision of RuneScape. The Server used is RuneSource, this is not one of those stupid cache loading server this is the real client and cache, well on that note I am looking for a team to do this project with, YOU MUST know what your doing and must be be able to work with RuneSource.
[u][b]Spots Open[/b][/u] Core Developer 2 Content Developers Web Developer Graphics Artists
This server will not be a remake of RuneScape this is going to be a unique server.
[/center]

item.title: RuneSource 484
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

owner5:

I am a web developer and i’m interested in this project. Please message me on skype : om4r321

The website development board has been a little dry lately, why don’t you come share some of your work and give a helping hand to those who need it? :o

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource 484
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Needs more information in my opinion. You just give the bare details, you don’t go into any depth at all about what you’re planning on doing. Go into why this server will be unique and why you should have people join your development team. What would make someone join your development team and not another? What experience do you have? What’s going to keep you motivated? I could go on and on, just try and be a little more specific :P.

Read full topic
